author: marcsaeg
msg: Fixes a security hole caused by URLs being decoded twice.  The second
decoding is happening when an InputStream is opened on a file: URL.  The
security problem does not appear when using JDK1.2.2.

msg: Clean handle of bad path to workers.properties file.
